title: Pucca (ONA) (Pucca: Funny Love)
synopsis: Pucca is a cute and energetic 10 years old Korean girl. Working as a delivery girl for the restaurant of her parents, she has one love obsession, Garu, and will do anything to kiss him!
staff: [['Plus-Tech Squeeze Box', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Demory, Bernard', ['ADR Director']]]
